abstract: The British bank was placed under formal investigation by French magistrates examining whether its Swiss unit helped wealthy clients avoid taxes.
snippet: The British bank was placed under formal investigation by French magistrates examining whether its Swiss unit helped wealthy clients avoid taxes.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The British bank HSBC said on Thursday that it had been placed under formal criminal investigation by French magistrates examining whether its Swiss private bank assisted wealthy clients to avoid taxes.

headline.main: HSBC Facing Criminal Investigation in French Tax Case
